author: dug
msg: Moved the notion of the DD hashtable into the ConfigManager
since not everyone will want to use it.  Changed the interface
APIs - now deploy, undeploy, list and query are the main entry
points.  Load/Save are now within the ConfigManager if needed.

author: wcloeten
msg: replaced props.setProperty() with props.put() for Java 1.1 compability

author: wcloeten
msg: cleaned up https patch - removed tabs and fixed indentation etc
